Posts.Content: sunflowerE152 wrote: I am @ day 10 of the first cycle of TC.  At this point, the metallic taste in my mouth is terrible.  Any suggestions? Marcia Dx 9/16/2010, IDC, <1cm, Grade 3, 0/14 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: What tastes good? sunflowerE152 Claire82

Posts.Content: sunflowerE152 wrote: I developed a mild case of LE (swelling in my hand mostly) after my mx a year ago.  I have since had DIEP and it got a little worse to begin with, but since it turned cool, it is better.  In fact, I cannot tell a difference with my sleeve and glove, so I have not been wearing them except when I do heavy labor. I am flying for the first time this week.  What precautions should I take?  I will wear my sleeve and glove - anything else?   I truly appreciate those of you who hang out here and give advise.  Without this board, I probably would not have gotten the treatment I needed and would have had a much worse case. Marcia Dx 9/16/2010, IDC, <1cm, Grade 3, 0/14 nodes, ER-/PR-, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Flying and LE sunflowerE152 kira
